programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff and Jason celebrate the 100th anniversary of Aston Martin. Jason drives James Bond's DB5 from Skyfall and learns from the the master craftsmen at the company's heritage centre, while Tiff tests the brand new Rapide S four door supercar

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason's in Italy to drive the most talked about hypercar of the year - the 730bhp Pagani Huayra. He's given an exclusive tour of how this incredible machine is made at the company's HQ, and lets the car off the leash on road and track.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato raids the Fifth Gear archives to look at the multitools of the motoring world, cars that can go anywhere and do just about anything - 4x4s.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato is joined by ex-Formula One driver Karun Chandhok to battle it out on the track in two of the most sort-after super sports cars; Porsche 911 GT3 RS vs Nissan GT-R Nismo.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason and Jonny face off in the series' first van versus pick-up challenge.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato gets behind the wheel of his favourite Porsches and puts them up against some iconic competition

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom gets an advance look at Formula 1 supremo Bernie Ecclestone's rare and unusual collection of cars. Tiff and Jason take the BMW M3 and the Mercedes C63 AMG to a circuit to determine which is most deserving of its £50,000 price tag.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki Butler-Henderson risks life and limb in the most dangerous car stunt of all - driving a car under a moving lorry. Jonny Smith tests the new Mercedes C Class and its revolutionary seat design.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki is at the controls in a classic Ford v Vauxhall battle, two boy racer specials, the Fiesta ST and Corsa SRi, wage war to find out which is fastest. Tom journeys to the Arctic Circle to test the Volvo XC70, an estate car with four wheel drive.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: An exclusive insight into America's most glamorous supercar club, based in an underground bunker at a private jet airport, Tiff Needell and Jason Plato race the BMW M3 against the Audi RS4.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Fifth Gear Tom Ford is testing the opulent £225,000 Bentley Azure with some help from film director Michael Winner; Jonny Smith tries to drive coast to coast using chip fat as fuel.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki tests the Mercedes Vito X or the VW Transporter Sportline on the track to find out which is quickest. Jonny embarks on the 600 mile transcontinental trip in the BMW 635d. Tom drives the ultimate 4x4, the 12 tonne, 10 foot tall Unimog.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki tests two cars that are low, light and very fast - Lotus Exige S v Caterham CSR. Tom visits Spain to drive the Toyota Landcruiser. Jason Plato drives the Mercedes CLK63 Black. Tiff teaches Heston Blumenthal the art of powersliding.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato is given his toughest mission yet - to do one month's motoring in 24 hours. It's in a bid to give the new BMW 3 Series the ultimate road test.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki finds out how quick the police are on a racing track; Jonny tests small economy cars to find out if they can climb one of Britain's biggest hills; Sarah tries to out manoeuvre Jason in an articulated lorry and Tiff drives the new BMW M3.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki finds out if the new 207 GTi is as exhilarating to drive as the 20 year old hot hatch the 205GTi; Fifth Gear conducts a fascinating world's first crash test.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason and Tiff try to master the controls of the Red Dragon, a 1700 hp Monster Truck. Jonny drives the new Renault Megane. Tom tests BMW's premium luxury car, the 7 Series. Tom Cave - a 17 year old Welsh rally sensation challenges Vicki.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In this edition of we're literally taking Fifth Gear to new heights and celebrating the most spectacular challenge petrol-heads have ever invented.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford tests the latest version of the car that is perennially voted one of Britain's favourite cars - the Land Rover Defender. Jonny Smith celebrates Ferrari's 60th Birthday.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tim Shaw tests whether the claimed 0-62mph acceleration times are actually true or not. Vicki Butler-Henderson heads out to the track in two Porsches. Tiff Needell has the first TV test of the world's first underwater car, the Rinspeed Squba.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell drives the Pagani Zonda, an astonishing Italian supercar that boasts a 7-litre, 550 horsepower engine and 200 mph plus performance.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tim Shaw tackles the horrible subject of car tax. Jason Plato meets Moto GP star James Toseland in another feature where Fifth Gear makes a sports stars dream come true. Tom Ford demonstrates the potential safety issues of convertibles.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Do cars explode like they do in the movies? Tiff Needell and Adrian Simpson stage their own car chase and then watch the experts who've worked on James Bond movies take over for the special effects.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Fifth Gear reconstructs one of the fastest-growing types of car crash in Britain; a terror that could turn a pleasant motorway journey into one of the most frightening rides of your life.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell and Vicki Butler-Henderson will be investigating what improvements mean in practice when they crash a brand new car head-on into a nine-year-old one.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Fifth Gear decides on its favourite sportscar. Which open-topped two seater offers the most fun - will it be a TVR, Lotus, or Porsche?

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell poses the question, "What's the best GT car you can buy for £90,000?" He tests the top contenders which both come from Stuttgart - the Mercedes SL55 AMG and the Porsche 911 Turbo.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom tests the chic rival to the MINI the Fiat 500; we find out if fuel additives really work by testing four leading brands; Jonny and Tom build and test an armoured Rolls-Royce with live ammunition and Tiff drives the Ferrari 430 Scuderia.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: The pestilential nuisance of cowboy clamping is now more common than ever. There are no rules or regulations governing the renegade companies that organise these rackets.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff pits Renault's latest hot hatch the stripped out and hardcore Megane R26.R, against a Caterham CDX. Jonny brings us his verdict on the brand new Ford Ka. Tim delves into the world of car crime, to make us more aware of what criminals look for.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tom Ford's been testing the Mazda's new MX5 Roadster Coupe; and Vicki Butler-Henderson has been thrashing Porsche's 911 GT3.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason and Tiff take part in another famous Fifth Gear dogfight on Quad Bikes. Jonny attends an auction of DVLA number plates. Vicki tests the Alfa Romeo Mito the new supermini that could finally wipe the smile off the faces of legions of Mini owners

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Fifth Gear guest presenter and Touring Car champion Jason Plato tests Chrysler's new 300C. Is this would-be competitor for the likes of the Mercedes E-class really a car to be taken seriously?

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Vicki meets 12 times Motor Trials champion and British motorcycling legend Dougie Lampkin. Jonny investigates another way of making cash from old cars. Jason takes the Ford Focus RS in the first TV drive of Ford's awesome new hot hatch.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff Needell tests the new MGTF. He finds it a better road car than the old MGL but it's still not a track day car. Quentin Willson reveals some ways people try to get off their speeding tickets.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason Plato test drives the sexiest car of the moment, the Aston Martin V8 Vantage Roadster, whilst Jonny Smith tests the hire car that James Bond drove in Casino Royale, the new Ford Mondeo.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: In this episode Fifth Gear re-unites two of the greatest names in Formula 1 history - Prost and Senna. This time it's Ayrton's nephew Bruno and Alain's son Nico who will do battle on the track.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Tiff and Jason hold a knock-out tournament to see if the 570hp Mercedes SLS AMG can beat its rivals from Aston Martin, Bentley and Jaguar. Jonny meets Swedish rally legend Stig Blomquist for some ice driving lessons in the new Audi A1 Quattro.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jason is in Iceland being taught how to race a brutal Formula Off-Road buggy up a cliff of volcanic rock by a former champion. Tiff is joined by former Le Mans winner Guy Smith to test a new version of Bentley's best selling car - the Continental GT.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny and Jimmy head to S. Korea to discover how they made world-beating cars in just a few years. Jimmy revisits the original Bentley Blower and Jason hits the track in an Alpine A110.

programme.title: Fifth Gear
programme.desc: Jonny Smith is in France, experiencing the action packed world of Rallycross; a cross between rallying and circuit racing, where 650bhp machines battle door to door.
